org.blindsideproject.chat.listener
Class ChatSharedObjectListener

java.lang.Object
  org.blindsideproject.chat.listener.ChatSharedObjectListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.red5.server.api.so.ISharedObjectListener
public class ChatSharedObjectListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.red5.server.api.so.ISharedObjectListener

This class implements the interface ISharedObjectListener to be registered as listener of a SharedObject. Whenever there is an event occurs on SharedObject, methods of this class are automatically called.

Author:
kthiruka

onSharedObjectSend

public void onSharedObjectSend(org.red5.server.api.so.ISharedObjectBase so,
                               java.lang.String method,
                               java.util.List params)
Called when a shared object method call, newMessage() is sent using chatSO. The chat message is extracted from the parameters passed and stored in stringBuffer.
